column5: haha I know its only April but I was getting spoiled there with them nice temps and spring like weather,now theres 6 inchs of snow on the ground ,Pointe au Baril is flooded over again and the highways been closed since 4 am cant even get to the Bike show
Nuthin worse than snow in April, specially when you've had a taste of spring  Cold & windy down here today, but at least none of the white stuff is left.
White stuff in Barrie..  Thank god I'm leaving for Florida on Tuesday!!!!

Poured rain up here in "Caygeon" country then it turned to snow early this morning...it is back to rain now so the snow is disappearing fast...Phew !  Just the thought of breaking out the snow blower...(*shudder*)  Spoke too soon...now it is flurrying...DANG !  Luckily we still have our snow tires on...
had to remove it ill try and get pics of the flood
Driving conditions up by South River/North Bay were among the worst I've ever seen today.  PLENTY of cars in the ditch up that way.  I couldn't believe the amount of snow up there today.
you guys think this will be the last hit of the white stuff?
Y'all are Canadian!!!   ... get used to it eh!
